sen.j: 尾上 鯉三郎（おのえ こいさぶろう）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Koisaburo ONOE (尾上 鯉三郎) was a kabuki actor.
Koisaburo ONOE was a kabuki actor.
sen.cmt: 漢字表記を削除しました。
sen.e: Koisaburo ONOE was a kabuki actor.
Koisaburo ONOE the first
Koisaburo ONOE the first
Koisaburo ONOE the first
- He later renamed himself Shinshichi ONOE the first.
He later renamed himself Shinshichi ONOE the first.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました
sen.e: He later renamed himself Shinshichi ONOE the first.

sen.j: 尾上鯉三郎 (2代目)（生没年不詳）
sen.e: Koisaburo ONOE the second (year of birth and death unknown)
Koisaburo ONOE the second (year of birth and death unknown)
Koisaburo ONOE the second (year of birth and death unknown)
- He was a child of Koisaburo the first.
He was a child of Koisaburo the first.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました
sen.e: He was a child of Koisaburo the first.
Koisaburo ONOE the third
Koisaburo ONOE the third
Koisaburo ONOE the third
- He was a child of Kansuke NAKAMURA the second.
sen.cmt: 「中村翫助」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: He was a child of Kansuke NAKAMURA the second.
sen.cmt: ハイフン削除しました。中村翫助→Kansuke NAKAMURA[http://www.kunisada.de/actor-signatures/kabuki-artists-writing-nakamura.htm]
sen.e: He was a child of Kansuke NAKAMURA the second.
His real name was Yoshio KAGAWA.
sen.cmt: 「加川義雄」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: His real name was Yoshio KAGAWA.
His real name was Yoshio KAGAWA.
His Haimyo (a.k.a. Haimei, the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Senjaku (扇雀).
His Haimyo (as known as Haimei, the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Senjaku.
sen.cmt: as known as に訂正しました。漢字表記を削除しました。
sen.e: His Haimyo (as known as Haimei, the term originally refers to a pen name as a haiku poet, but it also refers to a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Senjaku.
His yago (stage family name) was Nanbuya (南部屋).
sen.cmt: 「南部屋」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: His yago (stage family name) was Nanbuya.
sen.cmt: 漢字表記を削除しました。南部屋→Nanbuya
sen.e: His yago (stage family name) was Nanbuya.

sen.j: 脇役ながら活躍、主に老役に徹した。
sen.e: Although he played only a supporting role, he was active and devoted himself to playing an aged person.
Although he played only a supporting role, he was active and devoted himself to playing an aged person.
Although he played only a supporting role, he was active and devoted himself to playing an aged person.

sen.j: 当り役は「魚屋宗五郎」の親太兵衛の役など。
sen.e: One of his popular roles was that of Shintabei in 'Sakanaya Sogoro'.
sen.cmt: 「親太兵衛」の正式な読みは未確認です。
sen.e: One of his popular roles was that of a father Tahe in 'Sakanaya Sogoro.'
sen.cmt: 親太兵衛→a father Taheピリオドの位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: One of his popular roles was that of a father Tahe in 'Sakanaya Sogoro.'

sen.j: 日本俳優学校事務長や菊五郎劇団結成で理事を歴任。
sen.e: He worked successively in different positions such as the clerical supervisor of Nihon Haiyu Gakko (actor school), a board member in formation of the Kikugoro troupe, and so on.
He worked successively in different positions such as the clerical supervisor of Nihon Haiyu Gakko (actor school), a board member in formation of the Kikugoro troupe, and so on.
He worked successively in different positions such as the clerical supervisor of Nihon Haiyu Gakko (actor school), a board member in formation of the Kikugoro troupe, and so on.
